channel.title: My very first website
channel.description: Recent content on My very first website

item.title: About
item.description: Credits First This site was inspired by the ASA Committee on Career Development Portfolio Project written in Amstat news June 2022. Source code and method follows the fantastic tutorial bookdown by Yihui Xie, Amber Thomas, Alison Presmanes Hill (2022-08-08). Icon sources: Logo Home from freepnglogos.com 512x512 Logo from freepnglogos.com Linkedin Logo from freepnglogos.com Details This site is built using R language blogdown package and hosted from Netlify connected to my github source code.

item.title: Career Development Plan
item.description: Preparing For Your Career Roadtrip “If you don’t know where you are going, you might wind up someplace else” –Yogi Berra This tutorial will provide an introduction and procedural methodology to creating a development plan. Why Should You Have A Career Development Plan? What defines a successful career for you? Does everybody need a plan in order to be successful? No. There’s such a thing as luck too. But I bet most people already have a plan in some variant or another.
